content: Stream created by Johannes Drever.
[Mod] Morgan Rogers renamed stream neuroscience to practice: neuroscience.
Nathanael Arkor changed the access permissions for this stream from Public to Web-public.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the description for this stream.

  • Old description:

Discussions on research related to category theory and neuroscience

  • New description:

Deprecated, use #theory: science instead. Discussions on research related to category theory and neuroscience
Matteo Capucci (he/him) renamed stream practice: neuroscience to deprecated: neuroscience.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the posting permissions for this stream:

  • Old permissions: All stream members can post.
  • New permissions: Only organization administrators and moderators can post.
